Question: How many times did the adult guide the girl to operate the camera in this video?

Reference Answer: 1

Video ID: 9094000959

Program:

```

ANSWER0=SELECT(question="How many times did the adult guide the girl to operate the camera in this video?",information=ANSWERS0,choices=CHOICES)
FINAL_RESULT=RESULT(var=ANSWER0)
```
Rationale:

<hr><div><b><span style='color: blue;'>ANSWERS0</span></b>=<b><span style='color: red;'>VIDQA</span></b>(<b><span style='color: darkorange;'>video</span></b>=<img style="vertical-align:middle" src="data:image/jpeg;base64,">, <b><span style='color: darkorange;'>question</span></b>='How many times did the adult guide the girl to operate the camera?')=<b><span style='color: green;'>The adult guided the girl to operate the camera three times. (please judge according to both the answer and the caption below. For the caption, only take explicitly mentioned things as evidence.)

Answer: 2
